UltraByte starts his speech, "As you all know now, we are heading for 
Earth, when we land we will attack.  We do not know what factions 
yet.  But we will and I mean Will attack."

   As UltraByte says these words the finally enter Earths 
Atmosphere.  Lobstruck, Lady Right, Lepord, Kan Kick, and Snake Eyes 
all listen attenitivly.  Lepord was getting a little impatiant.

   'I thought this speech would be all exciting and a box of 
Cybertron Gravy.'  Lepord thought.

   "We will land then blow up the engine."  UltraByte says.

   With those words Lobstruck and Lady Right look up quickly in 
surprise.  "What!"

   "I know you are all thinking I must be crazy but I know all of you 
can defeat these bots.  We do not need to use the ship to blast them, 
we can do it ourselves."  UltraByte says as he slams his fist down on 
his chair.  That reminded UltraByte of the smudge earlier.  "By the 
way, Lady Right, next time you clean my chair don't miss a spot." 


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "hugar_twriker" <hugar_twriker@y...> wrote:
> Lepord, Lobstruck, and Lady Right all enter the bridge(Hopefully 
> followed by Void).  "Okay UltraByte the Intruder is taken care 
of."  
> Lobstruck says as he walks over to infront of the Big Chair of the 
> bridge.  Lepord and Lady Right start to have a side conversation.
> 
> "I fought good,"  said Lepord to Lady Right quiet enough that you 
> could only hear it if you walk by.
> 
> "Yeah, I am happy for you."  Lady Right says back.
> 
> OOC:  Umm I cant remember if any of the people joining my faction 
> have characters on the ship or are join later but I shall give them 
> time to respond and if they have to tell me something do so over 
> private mail.     
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> > Void nods silently before heading to the bridge.
